sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AbstractControl, FormControl, FormGroup, ValidationErrors, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'form'; form=new FormGroup({ first_name: new FormControl('',[Validators.required,Validators.pattern("[a-zA-z]{3,50}")]), gender:new FormControl("",Validators.required), country:new FormControl("",Validators.required), city:new FormControl("",Validators.required), age:new FormControl("",[Validators.required,Validators.pattern("[0-9]{0,3}")]) }) }

enter valid name
selsect gender
select country
select city
enter age
